title: Telling Time with Dinosaurs
description: TELLING TIME WITH DINOSAURS(SMART KIDS BRIGHT FUTURE) A dinosaur who knows how to tell time? Pre-School - Grade 2 It's six o'clock, TIME TO GET UP—and go to school with KURT the DINOSAUR! With this delightful clock book, a child can follow this cute, green dinosaur as he has a day of fun and learning—a day much like their own in school—while having fun telling time! Meet Kurt's friend - one cute little red dinosaur. FUN AND EDUCATIONAL BOOK! Learning to tell time is a lot of fun with Kurt the Dinosaur. It's about time!!
author: Joyce  Mitchell
